title: Money stock falls, nom GDP constant, velocity up

content.question: If the money stock decreases but nominal gross domestic product remains constant, which of the following has occurred?

choices.label: Income velocity of money has increased.
Income velocity of money has decreased.

content.answer: Income velocity of money has increased.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
